page.title: 18The Pizzeria, Dumfries
page.content: On Thursday 6th June, Catherine and I went to The Pizzeria to interview Mr.Farnocchia. We went in the morning since they wouldn't be so busy. We asked him what kind of food and wine he sold. He told us about the pizzas that were popular and not so popular. The pizza that wasn't popular was the Capri. All the wines were popular. They order their wine every three months from different companies. The most popular wine is Monticarlo wine; they have eight hundred bottles of wine. They get most of their customers at the weekend when they only have evening meals. It's mostly parents that go to the Pizzeria. If children do go they can get soft drinks if they like.They sell 10-20 bottles of wine a day. They always keep their lights dim, it looks nice and cosy.
